price: 57. Ama aysan odhan: Haddii Alle i hanuunin lahaa, waxaan ka mid ahaan lahaa kuwa ka dhowrsada (shirkiga iyo macaasida).
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
